overview: Sure, everyone loves girls. But it takes a sympathetic pornographer to capture the intimate eroticism of ladies who enjoy the company of other women. Director Jonni Darkko's "Girls Love Girls 4" is a sensuous celebration of lesbian love starring an array of gorgeous gals expressing their devotion using mouths, fingers, toys and other fetishistic implements. Along the way, Jonni and his handpicked cast prove that all-girl sex can be just as hard-core and nasty as the heterosexual variety.
title: Girls Love Girls 4
